abstract: Editorial contends FBI's reputation has been seriously stained by disclosure that it protected Whitey Bulger and other murderers in order to use them as informants against the mafia; says injustice has been further compounded by Appeals Court dismissal of lawsuits brought by families of Bulger's victims.
snippet: A federal court compounds the F.B.I.’s wrongful acts by dismissing suits in the Whitey Bulger case.
lead_paragraph: A federal court compounds the F.B.I.’s wrongful acts by dismissing suits in the Whitey Bulger case.

headline.seo: The Stain of the Bulger Case
